Hidden Markov Models & their Applications to Statistical Genetics Welcome

Hidden Markov Models & their Applications to Statistical Genetics Freddy Barragan, Spring 2021, Macalester College Welcome This is bookdown on discrete Hidden Markov Models & their applications to biostatistics is my capstone! I made this for my Mathematical Statistics course taught by Kelsey Grinde. Big thanks to her for her guidance and help. Content was written and gathered by Freddy Barragan with appropriate citations for print materials or direct links web materials. Embedded Youtube videos are under the sole ownership of their linked creator. Note: - This is a very brief primer & I assume minimal mathematical background.
